mapper.sql: select id, parent_id, dept_name, full_name, sort, remark, is_deleted
mapper.select: select * from blade_dept where is_deleted = 0

SELECT DISTINCT xiaji.id, xiaji.parent_id, xiaji.dept_name, xiaji.tree_code, xiaji.extend_type, case when (select COUNT(*) from blade_dept as t1 where t1.parent_id=xiaji.id)>0 then 1 else 0 end existChild FROM blade_dept shangji, blade_dept xiaji WHERE xiaji.tree_code LIKE CONCAT(shangji.tree_code,'%') AND xiaji.is_deleted = 0 and shangji.id=#{param1} ORDER BY xiaji.id

SELECT DISTINCT xiaji.id, xiaji.parent_id, xiaji.dept_name, xiaji.tree_code, xiaji.extend_type, xiaji.dept_name title, xiangxi.jigouleixing, case when (select COUNT(*) from blade_dept as t1 where t1.parent_id=xiaji.id)>0 then 1 else 0 end existChild FROM blade_dept shangji, blade_dept xiaji, anbiao_organization xiangxi WHERE xiaji.tree_code LIKE CONCAT(shangji.tree_code,'%') AND xiaji.is_deleted = 0 AND xiaji.extend_type='机构' AND shangji.extend_type='机构' AND xiangxi.jigouleixing not like '%ZF%' AND xiaji.dept_name != '政府' and xiangxi.dept_id = xiaji.id AND shangji.id=#{param1}

select b.* FROM ( select max(shangji.TREE_CODE) TREE_CODE from blade_dept shangji, blade_dept xiaji WHERE xiaji.TREE_CODE LIKE CONCAT(shangji.tree_code,'%') and shangji.EXTEND_TYPE=#{param1} and xiaji.id=#{param2} )a,blade_dept b where a.TREE_CODE=b.TREE_CODE

select b.* FROM ( select max(shangji.TREE_CODE) TREE_CODE from blade_dept shangji, blade_dept xiaji, anbiao_organization c WHERE xiaji.TREE_CODE LIKE CONCAT(shangji.tree_code,'%') and shangji.EXTEND_TYPE= #{param1} and shangji.id = c.dept_id and xiaji.id= #{param2} and c.jigouleixing in('qiye','geti','qita','sheng','shi','xian','fenzu') )a,blade_dept b where a.TREE_CODE=b.TREE_CODE
SELECT a.*, case when (select COUNT(*) from blade_dept as t1 where t1.parent_id=a.id)>0 then 1 else 0 end existChild from blade_dept a WHERE id=#{param1} and is_deleted = 0
select count(1) from blade_dept where is_deleted = 0 and parent_id=#{param1}
select * from blade_dept where is_deleted = 0 and id = #{id} limit 1
SELECT max(id) id FROM blade_dept;
select count(1) from blade_dept where is_deleted = 0 and extend_type = '机构' and full_name=#{param1}
SELECT id,dept_name from blade_dept WHERE dept_name= #{name} and is_deleted = 0 limit 1
SELECT id,dept_name from blade_dept WHERE dept_name like concat('%', #{deptname} ,'%') and is_deleted = 0

SELECT CONCAT( (SELECT TREE_CODE FROM blade_dept WHERE id = #{param1}), ( SELECT CONCAT( CASE WHEN LENGTH ((SELECT max(id)+1 FROM blade_dept)) = 1 THEN '00000' WHEN LENGTH ((SELECT max(id)+1 FROM blade_dept)) = 2 THEN '0000' WHEN LENGTH ((SELECT max(id)+1 FROM blade_dept)) = 3 THEN '000' WHEN LENGTH ((SELECT max(id)+1 FROM blade_dept)) = 4 THEN '00' WHEN LENGTH ((SELECT max(id)+1 FROM blade_dept)) = 5 THEN '0' ELSE '' END ,(SELECT max(id)+1 FROM blade_dept) ) ) ) tree_code

SELECT DISTINCT xiaji.id, xiaji.parent_id, xiaji.dept_name, xiaji.dept_name as title FROM blade_dept shangji, blade_dept xiaji WHERE xiaji.tree_code LIKE CONCAT(shangji.tree_code,'%') AND xiaji.is_deleted = 0 AND xiaji.extend_type='机构' and shangji.id=#{deptId}

SELECT DISTINCT xiaji.id, xiaji.parent_id, xiaji.dept_name, xiaji.dept_name as title FROM blade_dept shangji, blade_dept xiaji WHERE xiaji.tree_code LIKE CONCAT(shangji.tree_code, '%') AND xiaji.is_deleted = 0 AND xiaji.extend_type = '机构' AND LENGTH(xiaji.tree_code) >= 18 AND shangji.id = #{deptId}

select distinct a.id, a.parent_id, a.dept_name, a.dept_name as title FROM blade_dept a inner join anbiao_organization b on a.id = b.dept_id and b.jigouleixing = #{param1} and b.isdelete = 0 where a.extend_type='机构' and a.is_deleted = 0
and a.parent_id = #{param2}

select distinct a.id, a.parent_id, a.dept_name, a.dept_name as title FROM blade_dept a inner join anbiao_organization b on a.id = b.dept_id and b.isdelete = 0 where a.extend_type='机构' and a.is_deleted = 0 and a.id = #{param2} union select distinct a.id, a.parent_id, a.dept_name, a.dept_name as title FROM blade_dept a inner join anbiao_organization b on a.id = b.dept_id and b.isdelete = 0 where a.extend_type='机构' and a.is_deleted = 0 and a.parent_id = #{param2}

select DISTINCT a.id, a.dept_name, b.jigoubianma from( SELECT DISTINCT xiaji.id, xiaji.parent_id, xiaji.dept_name, xiaji.is_deleted FROM blade_dept shangji, blade_dept xiaji WHERE xiaji.tree_code LIKE CONCAT(shangji.tree_code,'%') AND xiaji.is_deleted = 0 AND xiaji.extend_type='机构' AND shangji.id= #{deptId} )a INNER JOIN( select dept_id,jigoubianma from anbiao_organization where isdelete = 0 and jigouleixing in ('qiye','geti') )b on a.id = b.dept_id ORDER BY a.dept_name asc
